title: Bendigo Art-Inspired Hotel near City Centre with Onsite Cafe & Bar
description:
Experience the bustling city of Bendigo at Mercure Bendigo Schaller, where historic architecture and modern creativity collide to form a cultural precinct filled with restaurants, theatres and art galleries. Only a short stroll from the celebrated Bendigo Art Gallery, serene Lake Weeroona and Golden Dragon Museum, this hotel is perfectly positioned for exploring the area.

Start your day with freshly brewed cup of coffee and cafe favourites at the hotel's onsite eatery, The Pantry, and when the sun comes down, treat yourself to a tipple of local beer and wine at the bar.

title: Boutique Victoria Art-Filled Suites Near Famous Bendigo Art Gallery & Coveted Restaurants
description: Experience Bendigo's artistic spirit first hand with a stay in this boutique creative haven, featuring some of the country's finest works of art. This chic hotel, doubling as a writer's or artist's retreat, is perfectly positioned for exploring the city's historic gold rush architecture, world-class art galleries and bustling markets. Savour a morning coffee at the trendy Handle Bar, explore the fascinating exhibits at Bendigo Art Gallery, or take a leisurely stroll around the beautiful Rosalind Park before returning to relax in the hotel's lounge.
